about.section_1: Hi, my name is Younes Akbour. I'm 22 years old, and I'm a web developer from Morocco. I started learning web development in 2020, and in 2021, I enrolled in a public training institute called OFPPT (Office of Vocational Training and Employment Promotion) in the section of digital development with the option of web full-stack. After two years, I got my diploma.
about.section_2: I enjoy building a web front-end or web app and learning new features of frameworks, I even used to design a web with Figma.
about.section_3: My preferred frameworks are Next.JS 13, React, and Laravel 9.
